metadata.name: DLL Execution via Rasautou.exe
metadata.comment: Detects using Rasautou.exe for loading arbitrary .DLL specified in -d option and executes the export specified in -p.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rasautou.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rasdlui.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -d ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')))

output.summary: Detects using Rasautou.exe for loading arbitrary .DLL specified in -d option and executes the export specified in -p.
